definitions.definition: To move cautiously by advancing its front end.
definitions.example: The ship nosed through the minefield.
She was nosing around other peopleâ€™s business.

definitions.definition: To detect by smell or as if by smell.
To push with one's nose; to nuzzle.
To defeat (as in a race or other contest) by a narrow margin; sometimes with out.
To utter in a nasal manner; to pronounce with a nasal twang.
To confront; be closely face to face or opposite to.
(in combination) Having some specific type of nose.
